nodes.bodyText:
Could you please make those a buildConfigField? That way, we can have one key+secret that is open-source and might get blocked if someone abuses it and an additional pair that is shipped only to Google Play and is not included in the source code.
Something like this should work:
https://github.com/AntennaPod/AntennaPod/blob/develop/app/build.gradle#L32
This converts to a hex string, right? If so, please rename the function to be more clear. Just converting to string would be something like new String(bytes)
Please use the same indention as the rest of the file. I know it is pretty inconsistent throughout the project but I think we should at least have it consistent within each file.
Please only add English strings. Everything else is handled on Transifex. Merging Transifex and translations from the git repo is troublesome.
